mapper.select: select id from checkin where user_id = #{userId} and date = current_date and create_time between #{start} and #{end} limit 1;
select count(*) as days from checkin where user_id = #{userId};

select address, date, date_format(create_time, '%H:%i') as create_time, if(status = 1, '正常', '迟到') as status, case when risk = 1 then '低风险' when risk = 2 then '中风险' when risk = 3 then '高风险' end as risk from user join checkin on user.id = checkin.user_id and checkin.date = current_date where user.id = #{userId} and user.status = 1;
